snippet: A vicious Taliban campaign against girls’ education crystallized in the cowardly shooting of a 14-year-old girl who fearlessly promoted going to school.
abstract: Editorial deplores attempted assassination of Malala Yousafzai, 14-year-old Pakistani advocate for education of girls, by Taliban; calls on Pakistani leaders to bring her attackers to justice and to forcefully combat Taliban's vicious campaign against girls.
lead_paragraph: A vicious Taliban campaign against girls’ education crystallized in the cowardly shooting of a 14-year-old girl who fearlessly promoted going to school.
